results.title: Evaluation of the Antinociceptive Action of Simvastatin in Mice
results.text_hl: ...Conclusion: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ exhibits analgesic activity in both central as well as peripheral models of @<m>DISEASE_Pain_Insensitivity_Congenital</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000699 @@@analgesia@@@, but central @<m>DISEASE_Pain_Insensitivity_Congenital</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000699 @@@analgesia@@@ shows only at higher concentrations.

citations.NLM: Katole NT, Kale JS, Salankar HV. Evaluation of the Antinociceptive Action of Simvastatin in Mice Cureus. 2022 Jul;14(7):e26910. PMID: 35983393
citations.BibTeX: @article{35983393, title={Evaluation of the Antinociceptive Action of Simvastatin in Mice}, author={Katole NT and Kale JS and Salankar HV}, journal={Cureus}, volume={14}, number={7}, pages={e26910}}

results.title: Cholesterol regulates cannabinoid analgesia through glycine receptors.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ also significantly decreases DH-CBD @<m>DISEASE_Pain_Insensitivity_Congenital</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000699 @@@analgesia@@@ in @DISEASE_Acute_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D059787 @@@acute and chronic pain@@@ of @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Yao L, Liu C, Wang N, Du F, Fan S, Guo Y, Zhang L, Pan Y, Xiong W. Cholesterol regulates cannabinoid analgesia through glycine receptors. Neuropharmacology. 2020 Oct 15;177():108242. PMID: 32712277
